articles.content: There's a lot to look forward to for Denver Broncos fans entering the 2022 season. With a bonafide franchise quarterback in the fold, this offense should finally see lift off for the first time since… [+7767 chars]

articles.title: GG Jackson commits to South Carolina, reclassifies to 2022 - On3
articles.description: July 23, 2022 - GG Jackson announces he has committed to South Carolina and reclassified to the 2022 class.
articles.content: The No. 1 overall player in the 2023 class, GG Jackson, has committed to South Carolina. Just nine days ago, Jackson became the first player to decommit from the North Carolina basketball program in … [+2028 chars]
